title: We've Lost Our Spark
description:
Rachelle's husband feels neglected and unhappy with their marriage ever since she went back to work. - Dr. Laura: "Women hold the match when it comes to lighting a fire in their marriage."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
